import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import Navbar from '../components/Navbar' import Calendar from '../components/Calendar' import "../styles/tables.css" const Homepage = ({ type }) => { const [month, setMonth] = useState(new Date().getMonth()+1); const [year, setYear] = useState(new Date().getFullYear()); const defaultMonth = new Date().getMonth()+1; const defaultYear = new Date().getFullYear(); const monthChange = (e) => { setMonth(e.target.selectedOptions[0].value); } const yearChange = (e) => { setYear(e.target.value); } console.log(year); return (

Calendar

defaultYear)? month :defaultMonth} year={year} />
) } export default Homepage
